value: Image:Rhinoceros in the Songimvelo Game Reserve.jpg
Rhinoceros in the Songimvelo Game Reserve

starring Val Kilmer and Michael Douglas was shot here.
Rhinoceros and a variety of antelope can often be seen. The elephants and leopards are more elusive. Cattle from nearby farms often graze inside the park.
Entrance is R100 per vehicle per day for game viewing.
You can drive in your own vehicle which should preferably be a 4x4.

The lodging area in the East is separated from the rest of the game reserve. Only poorly maintained log cabins are available. The area is mostly used by locals as a party spot with throbbing house music the norm. Guests are allowed access to the brown tinged water pool.
